cnd19:10.7: cūḷanikaṃ → culanikaṃ (bj), lokadhātuṃ passeyya, mahāsahassimpi → tisahassampi mahāsahassiṃ (bj) | tisahassiṃ mahāsahassampi (mr), yāvatakaṃ vā → yāvatā (bj, mr)
cnd19:11.2: hāsapañño → idaṃ padaṃ bj potthake, adhigatapaṭisambhido → adhigatapaṭisambhidappatto (csp1ed)
cnd19:12.4: atthi jānitabbaṃ → atthi dhammaṃ jānitabbaṃ (bj, mr), paramattho vā attho → paramattho vā (sya-all, csp1ed)
cnd19:13.5: sammāphusitānaṃ → sammā phassitānaṃ (bj) | phusitānaṃ (sya-all), aññamaññapariyantaṭṭhāyino → ... pariyantaṭṭhāniyo te (bj) | aññamaññaṃ pariyantaṭṭhāyino (sya-all)
cnd19:15.1: timitimiṅgalaṃ → timitipiṅgalaṃ (mr), sabrahmako loko → sabrahmako (bj, sya-all)
cnd19:35.1: pañhena atthiko āgatomhi → pañhatthikamhā āgatā (bj, sya-all)
cnd19:49.3: setakaccho → setavaccho (bj, cck, mr) | setagaccho (sya1ed, sya2ed, csp1ed), pālibhaddako → pāribhaddako (bj) | pāḷibhaddako (mr), pheṇapiṇḍo → pheṇupiṇḍo (sya-all), udakapubbuḷaṃ → udakabububuḷakaṃ (bj) | pubbulakaṃ (sya-all)
cnd19:53.20: Seyyathāpi → taṃ kiṃ maññatha (bj, sya-all, mr)
